nodes.text: Dreivus was a terrestrial astronomical object where the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry once fought sometime by the year 3 ABY. The company celebrated after, and the soldier Hazram Namir made an impression on some fire dancers on Dreivus. In 3 ABY, another soldier named Twitch brought up the fighting on Dreivus to other members of the company on their CR90 corvette, the Thunderstrike. Whilst the corvette was put in for repairs on the junk world Heap Nine a few days later, Namir also brought up the events on Dreivus with the Besalisk Gadren, who remembered Namir's time with the fire dancers.
Dreivus was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
